MGImage::pixel Union Reference

Union to treat one pixel as a unit and RGBA elements. More...

#include <Image.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

size_t uint
unsigned char uchar [4]

Detailed Description

Union to treat one pixel as a unit and RGBA elements.

One pixel consists of 4 bytes, which are (red, green , blue, alpha). If uint is used, the image's pixel is treated as a image, and if uchar[i] is used each element of the pixel can be handled.
